author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: Turn a Pi into a security camera or smart doorbell
name: Candle cam

Use microphone.description: Should audio also be recorded and transmitted? This is not compatible with Voco, since the microphone currently cannot be shared.

Contain.description: If enabled, pictures will be shown in full, with black bars around them. If disabled, they will fit the screen fully, but parts may be cut-off.

Clock.description: Show the time on top of the photos.

Use ramdrive.description: Might improve the longevity of your SD card, at the cost of memory/performance.

Debug.description: Enable this to see much more detail in the internal WebThings Gateway log about what this add-on is doing.
